returns.hasObservations: True if pool has sufficient observations

params.baseAsset: The base asset to price against (e.g., USDC)
params.token: The token address to get price for

params.baseAsset: The base asset to value against

returns.value: The value in base asset denomination

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_checkObservations(address).notice: External function to check observations (for try-catch)

feeOverrides(address,address).notice: Custom fee tier overrides: token => baseAsset => fee

getPrice(address,address).notice: Get the price of a token in base asset terms

getValue(address,uint256,address).notice: Get the value of a token amount in base asset terms

isPriceAvailable(address,address).notice: Check if a price is available for a token pair

poolOverrides(address,address).notice: Custom pool address overrides: token => baseAsset => pool

setFeeOverride(address,address,uint24).notice: Set fee override for a token pair

setPoolOverride(address,address,address).notice: Set pool override for a token pair

twapPeriod().notice: TWAP period in seconds (30 minutes for meme coins - balances manipulation resistance vs responsiveness)
